title: Arc length formula
text: Arc Length can be found by computing $$\int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{1+{\operatorname{g'}\left(y\right)}^2} \,dy$$, g'(y) is derivative of g(y) and interval [a,b]

title: Plug in
text: After we plug g'(y) and interval, we will have Arc $$Length=\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{1+{\left(\frac{1}{2\sqrt{y}}\right)}^2} \,dy=\int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{1+\frac{1}{4y}} \,dy$$
